channel.description: Recent content in books on George Paps Blog

item.title: Books read 2024
item.description: In case you need some reading inspiration, here is a list of the books I’ve read thus far in 2024. I have highlighted my favorite ones. Atomic Habits by James Clear - 8/10 Heart of Darkness by Joseph Conrad - 9/10

item.title: Books read 2023
item.description: In case you need some reading inspiration, here is a list of the books I’ve read in 2023. I have highlighted my favorite ones. American Pastoral by Philip Roth - 6/10 Les Miserables by Victor Hugo - 7/10 Clear Thinking by Shane Parrish - 6/10 The Comfort Crisis by Michael Easter - 8/10 Xenakis by Nouritza Matossian - 7/10 Benjamin Franklin by Walter Isaacson - 8/10 100 Baggers: Stocks That Return 100-to-1 and How To Find Them by Christopher W.

item.title: Favorite Books
item.description: The past years I’ve read a couple of books. The ones I enjoyed the most are: Non-fiction: Black Swan - Nassim Nicholas Taleb Antifragile - Nassim Nicholas Taleb The Bed Of Procrustes - Nassim Nicholas Taleb Hackers and Painters - Paul Graham Flow - Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi Leonardo da Vinci - Walter Isaacson Einstein: His Life and Universe - Walter Isaacson Steve Jobs - Walter Isaacson Thinking, Fast and Slow - Daniel Kahneman Benjamin Franklin: An American Life - Walter Isaacson Why We Do What We Do - Edward Deci The Obstacle Is the way - Ryan Holiday Stillness is the key - Ryan Holiday Ego is the enemy - Ryan Holiday Mastery - Robert Greene The Comfort Crisis - Michael Easter Why Nations Fail - Daron Acemoglu Macroeconomics Beyond the NAIRU - Servaas Storm 21 Lessons for the 21st Century - Yuval Noah Harari Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind - Yuval Noah Harari Essentialism - Greg McKeown The art of the good life - Rolf Dobelli The Pathless Path - Paul Millerd Fiction:
